page.title: 15FARMS
page.content: {There are 9 working farms in our area. {The majority of these are arable farms dealing mainly in wheat,barley, mangolds and oilseed rape.One farm keeps pigs and another sells hen and duck eggs.A lot of the farmers were too busy to talk to us but we visited Park Balk Farm and spoke to the farmer,Mr.Huddlestone.His family had worked the farm since 1920.Parts of the fields now in use were once quarries but these were filled in when the A1 flyover at Ferrybridge was built.At the moment he is growing barley,wheat and mangolds and was working in the fields clearing wild oats.Only 3 men work at the farm along with some casual summer labourers. They own 2 lorries and deliver grain to supplement the farm work.{Mining {under the farm is causing subsidence {in both the fields and buildings.
